detectCmp.exists: body > div#aa-cookie > div#cookieBannerBox > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(4):not([id]) > div:not([id]) > button:nth-child(2)#aa-cookie-reject-btn

detectPopup.visible: body > div#aa-cookie > div#cookieBannerBox > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(4):not([id]) > div:not([id]) > button:nth-child(2)#aa-cookie-reject-btn

optOut.waitForThenClick: body > div#aa-cookie > div#cookieBannerBox > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(4):not([id]) > div:not([id]) > button:nth-child(2)#aa-cookie-reject-btn

test.waitForVisible: body > div#aa-cookie > div#cookieBannerBox > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(4):not([id]) > div:not([id]) > button:nth-child(2)#aa-cookie-reject-btn
